sections.name: General Knowledge
sections.body: Though many deities are well-known across Dekatreis, the world is so grand in scale that some deities only reach minor audiences, limiting their influence on the world.

sections.name: List of Minor Deities
sections.body:
Masquerade, God of Thieves (CN)
Auril, Goddess of Winter (NE)
Shar, Goddess of Darkness and Loss (NE)
Milil, God of Summer (NG)
Torm, God of Courage and Self-Sacrifice (LG)
Lolth, Goddess of Murder and Chaos (CE)
Kiaransalee, Goddess of Undeath and Revenge (NE)
